title: Krypt (Campus Utility App)
description: A secure app made for students of one university. Built with Java and XML for Android, aimed at simplifying daily campus activities.

title: Study Guide (An OOP Project)
description: A C++-based study material organizer using OOP concepts like inheritance and polymorphism. Includes categorization features for better learning structure.

title: Digital Clock (Logisim)
description: Built using combinational and sequential circuits. Displays time with logic gates and counters, showing hours, minutes, and seconds.

title: Console App with Numerical Methods
description: CLI-based C++ app for root finding, interpolation, and ODE solving. Provides user-friendly method selection and clean output formatting.
